Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 03:07AM MercyP wrote: I had 4 drains total (2 on each side) for my first surgery. (Bilateral mastectomy with tissue expanders) They removed a pair of drains after 1 week and the other pair a week later.
Posts.Title: How long should drains stay in? LizzyG32 Jennifer522

Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 04:56PM MercyP wrote: I was told by my breast surgeon that the more activity you do, the more fluid will build up and fluid = bacteria and bacteria = infection. ü§∑üèª At 16 days I wasn't feeling ready to go back to work. (My job requires a lot of arm movement.) Listen to your body and don't push it. It needs time to recover and heal!
